item.title: First
item.description: Electronic Structure of Atoms The Wave Nature of Light All types of electromagnetic radiation move through a vacuum at $2.998\times10^8\text{m/s}$, the speed of light. This inverse relationship between the frequency and wavelength of electromagnetic radiation is expressed by the equation $$ \lambda\nu=c $$ where $\lambda$ (lambda) is wavelength, $\nu$ (nu) is frequency, and $c$ is the speed of light. Quantized Energy and Photons It is very important to quantize the energy although it’s very hard to understand why.
